page.title: 08New Housing Development
page.content: Three months ago I moved into a new small three bedroomed house. My sister has got the smallest room. My sisters room measures 8*6 foot. My room measures 10*12.My room is as long my dad's room. The top temperature the 8 radiators get up to is 25 degrees. All the bedrooms are built in the roof. My dad put a tree in the back garden. The kitchen is quite small. There is a lot of building going on around us. Mostly there are trucks dumping mud behind us. Also there is a hut near us.It is put up by the workmen who live in there. They drive JCBS and Hymacs. My feelings about the house is that its something to live in and its cosy and snug. When it is raining I do not like it because it is all muddy outside. Lee McMillan age 9
